sentences.sContent: Steam puffed out of the chimney.
sentences.sCn: 蒸汽从烟囱里一股一股地喷出来。

sentences.sContent: The boiler was puffing thick black smoke.
sentences.sCn: 锅炉一股股地冒出浓浓的黑烟。

sentences.sContent: Don’t puff smoke into my face.
I took a puff on the cigarette and started coughing.
sentences.sCn: 我抽了一口烟就开始咳嗽起来。
